title: Fleetwood Mac "Rumours" font
content:
Any ideas, or was it custom?

[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Image:FleetwoodMacRumours.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150412054321/http:/en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Image:FleetwoodMacRumours.jpg)
author: ZandEDad

comments.content: I'm sure it's a lettering job, as Mark says in the older thread.
Thank you. I tried a search, but it didn't work.

Hello again. I made my earlier comment from work, but now I am at home, looking at the booklet from the remastered and expanded _Rumours_ CD (2004)... The band name and album title on the cover are indeed handlettered, by Larry Vigon/Vigon Nahas Vigon.
